tokens.name: Akira / SOL

- **Volatility:** +77.1% (high) → Limit at -5%, TP +15% (mid-range for high volatility).  
- **Volume:** $34k (medium) → TP +15% (between $3k-$10k range).  
- **Momentum:** Stable → Timeframe of 4h balances quick reaction to price swings.
